analysis.description:
Reentrancy in LittlePhilCrowdsale.mintForPrivateFiat (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol):
	External calls:
	- _processPurchase(_beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- state (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol)
	- tokenCap (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol)
	- tokensRaised (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol#1264-1271):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol#1265-1266)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol#1267)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol#1281-1292):

	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol#1287-1288)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol#1290)

TokenTimelock.TokenTimelock (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol#663-674) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_releaseTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol#670-671)

TokenTimelock.release (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol#678-683) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= releaseTime) (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol#681-682)

TokenVesting.vestedAmount (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol#1306-1325) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < cliff (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol#1315-1324)
	- block.timestamp >= start.add(duration) || revoked[token] (/unique_chucks/18/0xc96553cdb596c9224b4b594c4eaf4b999597e7f8.sol#1318-1324)
